page.title: UBM Canon - Conference Call for Papers

snippet.s: UBM Canon offers the most up-to-date conferences and training from R&D to manufacturing. Our mission is to provide our audience with non-commercial,

text.s: > UBM Canon offers the most up-to-date conferences and training from R&D to manufacturing. Our mission is to provide our audience with non-commercial, original content and superb networking opportunities. Presentations are applications-oriented; attendees will walk away with information they can immediately apply to boost job performance.
Are you looking for a speaking opportunity and have a proposal that you would like to submit? Simply select a conference below and complete a submission form.

Please Note: We receive a large number of submissions on a regular basis. Therefore, only those who have been selected to participate will be contacted. All proposals are kept on file for future consideration. Commercial presentations will not be considered. We thank you for your interest!
Click here for UBM Canon Events.
Inquiries for UBM Canon Conferences - Email: ubmcanonconference@ubm.com Tel: +1 (310) 445-4200 | Privacy Policy
